CRUMB CATCHER DRESS

Through a draping design process, I created a dress featuring a crumb catcher at the waist. The stiffness of the crumb catcher contrasts with the fluidity of movement allowed by the pleating detail inserted at the front of the skirt. Resembling a monastic quality of serenity, there is a balance between the reserved and the striking in design.
